Şebnem Dönmez

Follow Şebnem Dönmez

Known for

TV Series Starring Şebnem Dönmez

Gizli Sakli

Naz lives with her mother and uncle, she is newly graduated from the police academy and is a protective character. The police force, after a mafia boss named Tarık Koşuoğlu, decides to use Naz and the crazy police officer Pamir together for a secret mission. Like a newly married couple, Pamir and Naz will move across the mafia family's house and gain Tarık Kosuoglu's trust and bring him to justice...

Son Yaz

FOX Türkiye, 2021 Cancelled/Ended | Drama, Action, Romance

Rating: 54.9/5

Idealist Public Prosecutor Selim Kara receives an offer he cannot refuse from the organized crime leader Selçuk Task?n, whom he sent to prison 8 years ago. Selçuk Task?n wants to testify in one of Prosecutor Selim's cases and his testimony will destroy the whole criminal organization. However, there is only one condition for this; the personal protection of his son, Akgün Gökalp Task?

Avlu

Netflix, 2018 Cancelled/Ended | Drama, Crime

Rating: 55/5

A woman entering a prison trying to establish her own justice. These women who are forced to give up their freedom are struggling in Karakuyu against their own order and their own laws.

Medcezir

Yaman, who lives in one of the Istanbul's suburbs, is arrested and put in jail along with his brother because his brother stole a car at a gas station.
